collectible.title: A Stolen Scouter
collectible.subtitle: Blowing up since the nineties.
collectible.text: "Hey there! It's me, Caulifla. I got my hands on a box of these old things since I last saw ya. Man, I haven't seen any of these in ages! You were sayin' that ya can't sense energy, so I figured this could come in handy. And hey, why don't ya call me sometime? We'll hit up that inventory place again if we're both in the area. Catch ya later!"
collectible.unlock: Finish a game with Caulifla to unlock this collectable (you don't need to win, she just needs to lose).

collectible.title: Super Saiyan 4
collectible.subtitle: A Saiyan connected to their primal roots.
collectible.text: "Oh hell yeah! I can't believe how powerful I feel right now! I don't get why my pants changed color, and I'm gonna need a top, I don't wanna be floppin' around everywhere when I fight. And... the tail, yeah, that's super weird. Still, I feel incredible! And y'know what? I've got you to thank for this. Hey, I'm serious! You've inspired me to push my limits, and you're seein' the results right now. Until next time, buddy!"
collectible.unlock: A Saiyan gets stronger every time they're defeated, and you've defeated Caulifla four times in battle, unlocking the Super Saiyan 4 achievement as a result.
